title: Fate/kaleid liner Prisma☆Illya 2wei Herz!
alternative_title: Fate/Kaleid Liner Prisma Illya 2Wei Herz!, Fate/kaleid liner プリズマ☆イリヤ ツヴァイ ヘルツ！
description: Based on the Fate/Kaleid Liner Prisma☆Illya 2wei! manga by Hiroshi Hiroyama, itself a spin-off of the Fate/stay night erotic visual novel by Type-Moon.
